ing.item: Chicken Stock or canned Chicken Broth
Green Onions diagonally sliced into 1/2-in pieces
Celery stalks cut diagonally in thin slices
Cooked Chicken; torn into bite-sized pieces

directions.step:
PUT THE CHICKEN STOCK in a soup pot and set over high heat. Add the ginger, green onions and celery. Bring to the boil, reduce heat, and simmer 10 minutes. Add the chicken, soy sauce and hoisin sauce and simmer 5 minutes. Add the water chestnuts. Taste for seasoning and add salt and pepper. Serve hot. May be made ahead a day. This freezes fine for a leftover. Don't freeze it for making an impression.
Makes 6 to 8 Servings
